remarks: A constant function is a path from ` Y ` to itself.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
statement:
pcopt.1 $e |- P = ( ( 0 [,] 1 ) X. { Y } ) $.
pcoptcl $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ Y e. X ) -> ( P e. ( II Cn J ) /\ ( P ` 0 ) = Y /\ ( P ` 1 ) = Y ) ) $.
